design_system.name: DragonFit OS
design_system.description: A high-performance, dark-mode gym tracker with neon green accents. Aesthetic: 'Matrix' meets 'Gymshark'.

layout.container: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-2xl lg:max-w-4xl px-4 md:px-6

Button.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-full shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(34,197,94,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
Button.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground font-bold uppercase tracking-wider rounded-full bg-transparent

Card.base: bg-card text-card-foreground border-border shadow-sm rounded-xl overflow-hidden relative group

Input.base: bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 text-lg font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 rounded-lg h-12

Navigation.bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border h-16 flex items-center justify-around z-50 pb-safe

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure neon green text is only used on very dark backgrounds. Use white for main body text.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible green ring offset-2 ring-2 ring-primary

logo_placeholder.alt: DragonFit Logo - Green Dragon on Black

hero_background.alt: Dark Gym with Neon Green Lighting

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INITIAL SETUP: Initialize a React project with Vite if not present. Install Tailwind CSS and Shadcn/UI.
2. THEME CONFIG: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors and fonts defined in 'design_system'. Add the Google Fonts link to 'index.html'.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'Layout' component that handles the mobile-first structure (Bottom Navigation for mobile, Sidebar for desktop if needed, but prioritize mobile).

4. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn/UI components but OVERRIDE the default styles with the 'custom_tokens' and 'visual_enhancers' defined here. Specifically, ensure Cards have the dark background and subtle borders.
5. PAGES: Implement the pages listed in the problem statement (Landing, Dashboard, Workout View, etc.). Use the 'hero_background' for the Landing page.
6. PWA: Ensure the manifest.json is configured for a standalone experience (display: standalone, theme_color: #09090b).
7. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links) as 'page-element-action' (e.g., 'login-submit-button').
8. MOCKING: If backend is not ready, mock API calls with local state or context.
9. CRITICAL: Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid White or Light Grey for readability. Use gradients only for backgrounds or borders.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for the Bottom Navigation.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
